Two y axis with different scales

Apr 3, 2016

It is said that generally it’s not a good idea to create a plot with two y axis but with different scales1. So ggplot2 does not really support it basicly, there is only a hackish way to achieve it2. But as the grid package was not available (for R version 3.2.3), I tried something else.

Result

Summary

And the reason why two axis is not advised: at x=3 b seems to be higher, but it is actually not! b is 54, and a is 61…
